critique: The document expresses concern about anti-Semitism and aims to combat it through policy and enforcement. It acknowledges the rise of anti-Semitic incidents and emphasizes the importance of protecting individuals from discrimination. The document conveys a sense of seriousness and determination to address the issue while also being mindful of legal and constitutional rights. Therefore, sadness and fear are present due to the rise of anti-semitism. Joy is not present. Surprise is not present. Disgust is present due to the rise of anti-semitism.
